body: Wouldn't it be more convenient to specify a name when adding a module to another one, i.e. similar to the Python API's `add_module()` function? As far as I can see that's the only place where you actually need a unique name.
body_html: Wouldn't it be more convenient to specify a name when adding a module to another one, i.e. similar to the Python API's add_module() function? As far as I can see that's the only place where you actually need a unique name.
